name: Catch Up (itch)
description:
In this game you are mediaval viking wich is constantly pressing a shield to achive more pets and make those pets work for you to achive more money.

If you want to go to the main menu press tab :)

I know it sounds bad but I think that when you play it you will notice that is family friendly.

I hope you like it. This is a game made for #2 Gdevelop GameJam

Discord: https://discord.gg/w98kCN8Quf

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCA9DMaT1r_Rd1w8Lq30wpEg
